def prep_vertex_all():    # æ³¨æ„æ›¿æ¢æˆè‡ªå·±çš„è·¯å¾„    ferror = open("kg/kg-clean/err_vertex.csv",'w')    frname = "kg/kg-clean/vertex.csv"    fwname = "kg/kg-clean/vertex_output_vertex_all.csv"    with open(frname, 'r') as fr:        with open(fwname, 'w') as fw:            fw.write("{},{},{}
".format(":ID", "name", ":LABEL"))            for line in fr:                try:                    # print(line.strip())                    line = line.strip()                    if not line:                        continue                    spo = line.split(",")                    # print(spo)                    fw.write("{},{},{}
".format(spo[0], spo[1].replace('"',''), "ENTITY"))                except:                    ferror.write("{}
".format(line))                    continuedef prep_edge_all():    ferror = open("kg/kg-clean/err_edge.csv",'w')    frname = "kg/kg-clean/edge.csv"    fwname = "kg/kg-clean/edge_output_all.csv"    print(frname)    print(fwname)    with open(frname, 'r') as fr:        with open(fwname, 'w') as fw:            fw.write("{},{},{},{}
".format(":START_ID", "name", ":END_ID", ":TYPE"))            for line in fr:                try:                    # print(line.strip())                    line = line.strip()                    if not line:                        continue                    spo = line.split(",")                    # print(spo)                    fw.write("{},{},{},{}
".format(spo[0], spo[2].replace('"', ''), spo[1], "RELATIONSHIP"))                except:                    ferror.write("{}
".format(line))                    continueif __name__ == '__main__':    prep_vertex_all()    prep_edge_all()
